definition: frenzied as if possessed by a demon, one of the ancient Norse warriors legendary for working themselves into a frenzy before a battle and fighting with reckless savagery and insane fury
details:
adjective
- frenzied as if possessed by a demon
= synonyms: amok
noun
- one of the ancient Norse warriors legendary for working themselves into a frenzy before a battle and fighting with reckless savagery and insane fury
= synonyms: berserker
